title: Ministry of Ports and Shipping (Sri Lanka)
text:
The Ministry of Ports and Shipping (<a href="Sinhala%20language">Sinhala</a>: වරාය හා නාවික අමාත්‍යාංශය "Varāya hā Nāvika Amathyanshaya"; <a href="Tamil%20language">Tamil</a>: துறைமுகங்கள் மற்றும் கப்பற்றுறை அமைச்சு) is a <a href="Cabinet%20of%20Sri%20Lanka">cabinet</a> <a href="List%20of%20ministries%20of%20Sri%20Lanka">ministry</a> of the <a href="Government%20of%20Sri%20Lanka">Government of Sri Lanka</a> responsible for ports and shipping. The ministry is responsible for formulating and implementing national policy on ports and shipping and other subjects which come under its purview. The current Minister of Ports and Shipping and Deputy Minister of Ports and Shipping are <a href="Mahinda%20Samarasinghe">Rohitha Abeygunawardena</a> and <a href="Kanaka%20Herath">Kanaka Herath</a> respectively. The ministry's <a href="Permanent%20Secretary">secretary</a> is M.M.P.K. Mayadunne.
Ministers.
The Minister of Ports and Shipping is a member of the <a href="Cabinet%20of%20Sri%20Lanka">Cabinet of Sri Lanka</a>.
